about_the_game:
Save the world by fighting a global infection in all corners of the globe. A unique combination of game genres ((Action/Survival, Flight Simulation, Bombing, Shooting, Driving) combined into one game provide a thrilling and all-round experience like no other.

Choose from 10 highly-detailed, varied levels all with their own twist. Escape hordes of zombies in the woods of America, land a plane in an emergency in Tokyo, drop bombs on hundreds of scurrying infected over Hawaii, avoid infected zombie ships that want to sink you or run over zombies on a stretch of road in Australia (with Kangaroos) and upon completion of all 10 exciting levels explore our solar system with in-depth information spoken about every planet you pass in a flyable space shuttle.

10 LEVELS:
  • Survive - North America
  • Battleship - Atlantic Ocean
  • Rescue - South America
  • Bomber - Hawaii
  • Survive - England (Europe)
  • Land - Tokyo (Asia)
  • Choices - Indian Ocean
  • Road Rage - Australia (Oceania)
  • Supplies - Russia (Asia)
  • Escort - Central Africa

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI GPU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD New Generation Dual Core 2.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8800 or ATI 3850
  • Storage: 2131 MB MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphic settings can be tuned down to allow virtually any computer to run the game at the cost of visuals
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6950
  • Storage: 2131 MB MB available space
